name: chat-bot-monorepo
description: Customer Service Chatbot with Admin Panel

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../admin-panel && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.start:all: cd server && npm run dev && cd client && npm start && cd admin-panel && npm start
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../admin-panel && npm run build
scripts.test: cd server && npm test && cd ../client && npm test && cd ../admin-panel && npm test
